text: "Are You Growing Tired of My Love" is a 1969 song by British rock band Status Quo. It was taken from their second studio album Spare Parts. It went to number 46 in the United Kingdom. == Track listing == # "Are You Growing Tired of My Love" (A King) – 3:33 # "So Ends Another Life" (Lancaster) – 3:10 Category:1969 songs Category:Status Quo songs
title: Are You Growing Tired of My Love
